item.description:
Due to the Lone Gull 10k race this weekend I am moving the LSD run to Thursday (9/17) after work.

Weather is supposed to be 60-ish and mostly cloudy, so hopefully we won't have to contend with rain and can enjoy the cooler temps.

I have 12 miles on the schedule for this week, feel free to lengthen or shorten as it fits your needs.

I'll post the final meeting location at 6pm tonight after I get an idea of whether I'm likely to be running alone or with a few jolly souls.

cheers,
jess

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Late Afternoon Long Slow Distance Run
